docs.title: Extensions
docs.text: * Ebla Chat * Ebla Rate * Ebla Enum Color

docs.title: This is to facilitate the process of communication among the company's employees within the company's system without the need for external programs.
Text messaging: Users can send and receive text messages.
Media sharing: Users can share photos, videos, and other types of media with users in system.
Voice messaging is a feature on Ebla Chat that allows users to record and send voice messages to users in system.
These are some basic features of Ebla Chat, but new features and updates are released regularly to improve the user experience and provide new functionalities.
Setting up
docs.text:
after installing the extension,

  1. go to UserInterFace -> add to Tab List .

docs.title: Ebla Chat .
docs.text: 1. go to Roles -> enable access to Dialog .

docs.title: Ebla Chat .
docs.text: 1. go to Chat -> Select a user to initiate a conversation with them. .

docs.title: Enhancing the Stream with additional benefits.
This extension enables you to add a field color picker and add colors to option fields.
after installing the extension,
docs.text:
Enum Type

Color Picker Field

docs.title: Ebla Enum Color. Color Picker Field
this feature enables you to add a field color picker.
How to use it
docs.text: 1. go to Admin -> Entity Manager -> Scope -> Fields -> Add Field -> Color Picker.

docs.title: This feature enables you to add colors to option fields .
How to use it
docs.text:
1. go to Admin -> Entity Manager -> Scope -> Fields -> Add Field -> Enum Type .

and select color option.

  1. Enable Display as Label option.

docs.title: This extension enhance the link multiple field with ability to show any other field just like any list view.
It is utilized across various systems that involve invoice management, including pharmacies, warehouses, companies, medical clinics, restaurants, hotels, tourism companies, and banking systems.
docs.text:
• Order & order lines
  • Shipment & shipment lines (items)
  • Real estate property & owner-sips with owner rates

docs.title: Before  and  After  using the extension.
Enable Extension :
docs.text:
After installation do the following steps. // make red txt

1. Go to the Administration > entityManager > Scope > Relationships .

2. Enable Link Multiple Field .

3. Go to Fields links name Administration > entityManager > Scope > Field Link Name and Enable Form.

docs.title: Ebla Link Multiple Pro. Footer Sum
docs.text: This feature allows you to choose the fields on which you want to perform the sum operation.

docs.title: How to use it

1. select fields .

1. Footer Sum Fields Map

This feature enables you to select the fields on which you wish to perform the parent sum operation.

docs.text: 1. select fields From parent .

docs.title: Ebla Link Multiple Pro. Custom Layout
docs.text: This feature enables you to pick the fields that will be displayed in the list view.

docs.title: How to use it
docs.text:
1. select Custom Layout from the layout drop-down list.
  2. select the fields that you want to display in the list view.

docs.title: Ebla Link Multiple Pro. List Layout
docs.text: This feature enables you to pick the list displayed in the list view.

docs.title: How to use it
docs.text: 1. select List Layout from the layout drop-down list.

docs.title: Ebla Link Multiple Pro. List Small Layout
docs.text: This feature enables you to pick the list small displayed in the list view.

docs.title: How to use it
docs.text: 1. select List Small Layout from the layout drop-down list.

docs.title: Ebla Link Multiple Pro. View
docs.text: This feature enables you to choose the item detail display in small detail edit.

docs.title: How to use it
docs.text: 1. select edit from the layout multi enum drop-down list.

docs.title: Ebla Link Multiple Pro. Remove
docs.text: This feature enables you to remove a row record.

docs.title: How to use it
docs.text: 1. select remove from the layout multi enum drop-down list.

docs.title: Ebla Link Multiple Pro. Unlink
docs.text: This feature enables you to unlink a row record.

docs.title: How to use it
docs.text: 1. select unlink from the layout multi enum drop-down list.

docs.title: Ebla Link Multiple Pro. View
docs.text: This feature enables you to choose the item detail display in small detail view.

docs.title: How to use it
docs.text: 1. select View from the layout multi enum drop-down list.

docs.title: Ebla Link Multiple Pro . Add Button
docs.text: This feature enables you to add an "Add" button to add row record.

docs.title: How to use it
docs.text: 1. Enable the "Add Button".

docs.title: Result:
docs.text:
• Click on the "Add" button to add a new row.
  • Click on the "New Record" button to add a new record.

docs.title: Ebla Link Multiple Pro . Select Button
docs.text: This feature enables you to add a "Select" button to select multiple records.

docs.title: How to use it
docs.text: 1. Enable the "Select Button".

docs.title: This add-on offers convenient access to crucial links within your system while also enhancing its aesthetic appeal.
It streamlines navigation and improves the overall user experience by making it simple to find and utilize important resources.
The added cosmetic touch also elevates the visual appeal of the system, making it more visually pleasing and user-friendly.
The Features:
docs.text:
• Custom link.
  • Separator.

*Favorite Entity.

docs.title: this feature enables you to add a custom link .
How to use it
docs.text:
• 1.go to Admin -> User Interface->
  • 2.Select Add Custom Link.
  • 3.put custom link e.(Account/create).

docs.title: this feature enables you to add a favorite entity in Nav Bar.
How to use it
docs.text:
• 1.go to Admin -> User Interface->
  • 2.Select Add.
  • 3.Select Star.
  • 4.Move the star to the top of the table list .
  • 4.Select Entity.

docs.title: this feature  add a separator in Nav Bar.
How to use it
docs.text:
• 1.go to Admin -> User Interface->
  • 2.Select Add Separator.

docs.title: Safe Upgrade
docs.text:
• This extension enhances the functionality of the fields in EspoCRM by introducing a new field type called Rate.
  • It allows for both single and multiple criteria evaluations and calculates the average rating across all rows Additionally.
  • it supports search and list view functionality.

docs.title: after installing the extension,
docs.text:
1. go to Admin -> Entity Manager -> Scope -> Fields -> Add Field -> Rate field.

Rate Field

docs.title: this feature enables you to add a field rate .
How to use it
docs.text: 1. go to Admin -> Entity Manager -> Scope -> Fields -> Add Field -> Rate field.

docs.title: Type : Extension
docs.text:
• provides an enhanced user experience by enabling users to personalize their EspoCRM login screen with a custom background image of their choice.
  • the ability to upload a personalized favicon, which adds a unique, professional touch to the EspoCRM.
  • This extension also includes the feature of opening the side menu on hover, allowing for convenient navigation.
  • includes the ability to customize the colors of the EspoCRM, providing an even more personalized experience.

docs.title: after installing the extension,
docs.text: 1. go to Admin -> User Interface -> Select Eblasoft Theme .

docs.title: The Features
docs.text:
1. Login Background Image
  1. Favicon

3. Side Menu

  1. Color Customization

docs.title: This extension allows you to customize the colors of the EspoCRM.
How to use
docs.text:
1. Go to Admin -> Ebla Extensions -> Ebla Theme.

  1. Select the Ebla Theme Color .

  2. Select the color.

docs.title: the ability to upload a personalized favicon, which adds a unique, professional touch to the EspoCRM.
How to use
docs.text:
1. Go to Admin -> Ebla Extensions -> Ebla Theme.
  1. Select the Favicon.
  1. Upload the image.

docs.title: This extension provides an enhanced user experience by enabling users to personalize theirEspoCRM login screen with a custom background image of their choice.
How to use
docs.text:
1. Go to Admin -> Ebla Extensions -> Ebla Theme.
  1. Select the Login Background Image.
  1. Upload the image.

docs.title: This extension includes the feature of opening the side menu on hover, allowing for convenient navigation.
How to use
docs.text:
1. Go to Admin -> Ebla Extensions -> Ebla Theme.
  1. Enable the Side Menu.

docs.title: Type : Extension
docs.text:
• This extension facilitates the checking of duplicate items within the database.
  • This extension allows for the automatic completion of chosen fields.
  • This addition allows adding details at the beginning of the field
  • This extension allows adding details at the end of the field .

docs.title: after installing the extension,
docs.text: 1. go to Admin -> Entity Manager -> Scope -> Fields -> Add Field -> ( Varchar Type ).

docs.title: The Features
docs.text:
1. Is Unique
  1. Auto Complete
  1. Prefix Label
  1. Suffix Label

docs.title: The Feature allows for the automatic completion of chosen fields.
How to use
docs.text:
1. Go to Admin -> Entity Manager -> Scope -> Fields -> Add Field -> ( Varchar Type ).
  1. Select the Entity Autocomplete From option.
  1. Select the Autocomplete Field option.

docs.title: The Feature facilitates the checking of duplicate items within the database.
How to use
docs.text:
1. Go to Admin -> Entity Manager -> Scope -> Fields -> Add Field -> ( Varchar Type ).
  1. Enable the Is Unique option.

docs.title: This addition allows adding details at the beginning of the field .
How to use
docs.text:
1. Go to Admin -> Entity Manager -> Scope -> Fields -> Add Field -> ( Varchar Type ).
  1. Type The Prefix Label that will be at the beginning of the field.

docs.title: This addition allows adding details at the end of the field .
How to use
docs.text:
1. Go to Admin -> Entity Manager -> Scope -> Fields -> Add Field -> ( Varchar Type ).
  1. Type The suffix Label that will be at the end of the field.

docs.title: Type : Extension
docs.text:
• This feature facilitates the addition of a toggle button on the top navigation bar, allowing for the switching of a boolean field within the user's entity.
  • This feature calculates the number of working hours per day.

docs.title: after installing the extension,
docs.text: 1. go to Admin -> Ebla Extensions.

docs.title: The Features
docs.text:
Nav Bar User Switch Button

Top Nav Work Log Button

docs.title: Ebla Nav USer Switch Button . Nav Bar User Switch Button
This feature facilitates the addition of a toggle button on the top navigation bar, allowing for the switching of a boolean field within the user's entity (Online - Offline).
How to use
docs.text:
1. Go to Admin -> Entity Manager -> User -> Fields -> Add Field -> ( Boolean Type ).
  1. Go to Admin -> Ebla Extensions -> Nav Bar User Switch.
  1. Enable Nav Bar User Switch Enable.
  1. Select the field type boolean.

docs.title: Result:
docs.text:
1. Online
  1. Offline

docs.title: Ebla Nav USer Switch Button . Top Nav Work Log Button
This feature calculates the number of working hours per day.
How to use
docs.text:
1. Go to Admin -> Entity Manager -> User -> Fields -> Add Field -> ( Boolean Type ).
  1. Go to Admin -> User Interface
  1. Go to Admin -> Ebla Extensions -> Nav Bar User Switch.
  1. Enable Top Nav Work Log Enable.
  1. Select the type boolean.

docs.title: Result:
docs.text:
1. Start

After click start

  1. Stop
